visual.name: heatmap
visual.description: Visualize the density of data points as a heatmap

dataRoles.description: Addresses or Ids to differentiate records
dataRoles.name: location

dataRoles.description: (Optional) Numeric values associated to locations, defaut is one
dataRoles.name: value

dataRoles.description: (Optional) Records are grouped based the values in this field
dataRoles.name: group

radius.description: The influential radius for each data point

opacity.description: Max opacity used by the renderer

peak.description: The strategy to decide the max value based on groups

max.description: Manually set the maximum value used by the renderer

group.description: Customize group visuals when not animating

animation.description: Animate through each group in the sorted order

freeze.description: Time duration for each group (in seconds)

cache.description: Cache geocoding results to speed up

lang.description: The language used in the map
